name: Robot Tsunami
description: Robot Tsunami is an insane, fast paced and unique arcade style twin stick shooter, tower defence & shoot 'em up game all in one.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2.0+ Ghz processor Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Gfx card with shader model 3 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3072 MB available space
